tool_description: Processes status changes for multiple tickets simultaneously, with validation and rollback capabilities for batch operations.

ticket_ids.description: Array of ticket IDs to process

target_status.description: Target status to apply to all tickets

processed_by.description: ID of the agent performing the bulk operation

batch_reason.description: Reason for bulk processing: maintenance, system_update, mass_resolution, data_cleanup

validate_transitions.description: Whether to validate each status transition before processing

continue_on_error.description: Whether to continue processing if some tickets fail

send_notifications.description: Whether to send notifications for each status change

batch_comment.description: Comment to add to all processed tickets

error_messages: Too many tickets: Maximum 100 tickets can be processed in a single batch operation.
Too few tickets: At least 2 tickets are required for bulk processing.
Invalid target status: The specified target status is not valid.
Invalid batch reason: Use one of [maintenance, system_update, mass_resolution, data_cleanup].
Agent authorization failed: The specified agent does not have permission for bulk operations.
Validation errors: Some tickets have invalid status transitions. Review the results array for details.
usage: Provide ticket_ids array, target_status, processed_by, and batch_reason. Configure validation and error handling options as needed. The tool processes tickets in batches and provides detailed results.

total_tickets.description: Total number of tickets in the batch

failed_updates.description: Number of tickets that failed to update

processing_time_seconds.description: Time taken to process the batch in seconds

batch_id.description: Unique identifier for this batch operation

failed_ticket_ids.description: List of ticket IDs that failed to process
